name: Tonilia

aspects.trouble: Trust No One - Not Even Guild Members
other_aspects: Eyes for Value, Nose for Trouble

stunts: Appraiser's Eye: +2 to Resources when evaluating stolen goods or determining market value
Fence Network: +2 to Contacts when seeking buyers for hot merchandise
Guild Quartermaster: Can provide guild members with specialized equipment at fair prices
notes: Tonilia is the Thieves Guild's fence and quartermaster, operating from the Ragged Flagon Cistern in Riften. She's a practical, no-nonsense Nord who knows the value of everything and trusts almost no one. She handles the guild's stolen goods, converting hot merchandise into cold coin, and also maintains the guild's armor and equipment supply. While she's not the warmest person in the guild, she's reliable and efficient, making her invaluable to operations. She has extensive contacts in Riften's black market and knows how to move goods without attracting attention.
combat_tactics: Tonilia avoids combat when possible, preferring to stay in the safety of the Cistern. If forced to fight, she relies on quick strikes and then retreating to more defensible positions. She's competent but not a warrior.
social_interaction: Tonilia is direct and businesslike. She doesn't waste time on pleasantries and gets straight to the point. She's skeptical of newcomers and watches them carefully, but will warm up slightly to those who prove reliable. Her speaking style is clipped and efficient, though she occasionally shows dry humor. She respects competence and dislikes sloppiness.

relationships.Vex: Guild member, mutual respect for professionalism

personality_notes.speaking_style: Direct, businesslike, slightly suspicious, dry humor
personality_notes.character_growth: As the guild recovers, Tonilia becomes slightly more trusting and takes pride in the improved operation

story_hooks: Primary fence for stolen goods in Act 1-3
Provides guild armor upgrades as player advances
Can offer information about valuable targets through her contacts
May provide side jobs involving fence network maintenance

dialogue_samples.greeting: You need something? Make it quick - I've got merchandise to move.
dialogue_samples.fencing: Let's see what you've got. I hope it's clean work - I don't need the heat.
dialogue_samples.approval: Not bad. Keep bringing me quality goods like this and we'll get along fine.
dialogue_samples.disapproval: This is sloppy work. Heat like this costs me contacts. Do better.
dialogue_samples.personal: Trust is earned in the guild, not given. Prove yourself and we'll talk business.

special_perks: Higher prices for guild members in good standing
